com.ibm.atp.auth
Class Auth

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.atp.auth.Auth
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthByDigest, AuthBySignature
public abstract class Auth
extends java.lang.Object

The Auth class is the class for challenge-response authentication.

Version:
1.00 $Date: 2009/07/28 07:04:53 $
Author:
ONO Kouichi

Field Detail

DEFAULTDIGESTALGORITHM

private final java.lang.String DEFAULTDIGESTALGORITHM
The Message Digest (one-way hash) function algorithm. "SHA", "SHA-1", "MD5" and "MD2". docs/guide/security/CryptoSpec.html#AppA
